TopicTitle: Lost Columns on Left of Navball

Articles.Content:
Sup guys!!

So I bought the game and been playing for about a week. Awesome game!!

I'm in career mode and I'm not sure what I've done. I lost the two columns on the left of the navball that appear when you turn SAS on. I have the upgrade for retrograde and prograde.

I've google searched, looked at keybindings etc.. I'm coming up empty

Help Please!

Thank you

Edited October 1, 2015 by sticky

If you mean the icons, they ONLY appear with a capable pilot or probe core.

Just keep in mind scientists and engineers are NOT pilots.

Yay it was the pilot!! Which is weird because Jeb was my best pilot, lost him for awhile (no clue why) and then he magically appeared again...

Anyways, looks like valentina can do it

Thanks so much Tex!!

If you get stuck on career, give science mode a go. You still have to unlock the tech tree but without having to complete contracts to fund everything.

That said - sounds like you're doing well for a week in!

BTW, in Sandbox and Science mode all the probes and all the pilots can do every mode of SAS.

In Career you'll be sorely surprised OKTO can only do Stability Assist. You're gonna miss "Target" mode for a long time.
